Class WorldReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • WorldReader
  • public class WorldReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to read .lvl file and create instances of Sprites. Also feeds event times to World

    • Method Detail

      • readLevel

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> readLevel​(java.lang.String currentLevel)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads .lvl file and creates Sprites
        Parameters:
        currentLevel - filename of level to be generated
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all of the Sprites that are specified in the .lvl file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is no .lvl file in the folder with the filename specified

      • pickRandomLog

        public static int pickRandomLog​(java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> list)
        Picks a random Log or LongLog from the list of Sprites and returns the position of the chosen Log or LongLog in the ArrayList
        Parameters:
        list - ArrayList containing all the generated Sprites
        Returns:
        Chosen Log or LongLog position

      • returnChosenLog

        public static Vehicle returnChosenLog​(java.util.ArrayList<Sprite> list,
                                      int chosenLogNumber)
        Returns a shallow copy of the chosen vehicle
        Parameters:
        list - ArrayList to pick Vehicle out of
        chosenLogNumber - Log or LongLog position in the list of Logs and longLogs
        Returns:
        shallow copy of chosen Log or LongLog
